游戏玩法还是蛮不错的，但是，制作组麻烦优化优化服务器吧，比什么都要强！如狗屎一样的服务器我就不想说什么了，再说一下刷血点的，什么鬼呢？各种升血网转升然后各种刷好道具什么的？！！！这他妈的什么鬼？！  还有，屠夫玩家拔插？请问这样的还有什么游戏体验可以谈？还有微调的，走路速度完全不正常的，不是傻子都能看出来调过，再有就是实力跟段位不符的，也就是恶意掉段然后去虐新手或者半新手的，总之就是虐技术不如自己的玩家还很有优越感的，还要点脸吗？各种卡BUG？以上这些都是影响游戏平衡了吧？请问玩家举报你们封了吗？最最最重要的服务器！真的是请你们优化优化了，玩一把卡出去，然后要试个七八分钟才能进去，谁还有心态去玩？要不你制作组来玩一玩试试？哦对了，听说你们的游戏已经做得很好了？那又请问好在哪里了？好在了屠夫不断加强人类不断削弱？好在了服务器越来越差？好在了掉帧越来越严重是吗？智障组能不要用脚做游戏吗？属实是真的玩不来。如果满星是五星，一星都不想给吧，无奈还是给一星游戏玩法吧，智障组真的是该改改服务器了，不要等到2020年夏天出独立服务器了！！！OK？感觉这个游戏凉掉真的还是蛮正常的了呢！！！

Played this game for hundreds of hours on PS4 and switched to PC. I love the asymmetrical gameplay and horror setting. How many other games let you play as Myers, Freddy and a huge roster of awesome original characters. I play both sides pretty equally as both sides are really fun. The Devs have put a lot of work into additional content and the game is growing all the time.

Some negatives though: The community can be toxic, especially survivors so if you want to play killer you'll need a thick skin. Performance also needs a lot of work so don't purchase unless you have a decent mid to high range PC.

For the price though during sales I definitely recommend DbD to anyone.

Can say without a doubt one of the ABSOLUTE WORSE games I have had the displesure of playing in my life. I got it under the recomendation of friends, waiting 4 months to finally play it for 2 hours to only find out the following:

1. The game is horribly made and too damn loud. I turn my settings in game, out of game, and set set down to singal digits for me to just be able to tollerate how unberably loud this game is. 
2. any and all items I had that made the game remotely playable and somewhat fair, were all items I had to win and pay for. I can be fine with that, if it were not for the fact that the killers which you can just buy and get stuff with, were just always going to be better regardless of what I had or was sharing even in a custom game with people saying they were going easy on me.
3. How annoying the display/ alert system is. I know its a horror game and all no game should be this furstating to play with the stupid alerts to have you do something appearing and then only giving you milleseconds to respond before you get damaged, are damaged, etc, etc.
4. The killers are WAY too fast. Even with super rare speed perks and the killers having none, and holding my sprint key I was constantly dying because I could not get away fast enough to avoid anything.
5. If I filled a bar and did something, that means it is done. Multiple times I struggled out of a Killer's grasp when I was being carried to a hook only to not get freed and was still hooked, and again even with perks to get myself all of the hook all attempts to get off of them resulted in me dying faster.
I cannot express this enough, this is the WORST GAME ever to be made. I dont wanna pay money to play a game that if I want to even do SLIGHTLY BETTER I have to shell out even more cash to get it because game designers cannot make a balanced game and give it so you for free. These micro-transactions to give you new killers and perks that make you better as a player, and the only way you can be as good as them is to also pay for that is bad game design, and bad for players.  If any people who made this game are reading this, you should honestly be ashamed you made such a terrible game. If I could, I would without a doubt get a refund for this pile of shit I purchased. 
Do not play this game, save your money and get a game that is actually worth your time because I can assure you this is not it.

Um jogo bem massa, tem seus bugs, nunca aconteceu comigo, mas tem seus bugs, atualmente um dos senao o favorito dos jogos que eu tenho.
Otima jogabilidade sendo possivel ainda jogar com o controle.
AVISO face camping garantido nas primeiras 10 horas de jogo.

It look to me like they made a great game, and then new director come in, decide to add new features, because other games have it, without really understanding what is it about, and destroy whole fun.

It's still a good game, but I'm a bit disapointed about it.
In video they said "we don't have indicator how your character is scared", well now they have.
In video they said "we want you to be scared, not your character". But they give indicator how close killer is, so you always know when he is comming, so he will never supprise you, so you will never be scared in that game.

It's fun to play for a while, but it's not what I was expecting.

I have spent money and a lot of time in Dead by Daylight, this used to be one of my favorite games. Due to a third party software I used with steam (it wasn't any type of cheat) I was game banned. I tried to appeal to both the DBD devs and EAC. DBD told me they couldn't do anything and I must speak to EAC. I spoke with EAC they told me there is a third party software I was using (didn't tell me if it was messing with DBD specifically) and said they could not appeal my ban. Had they given me a warning or some kind of assistance I would have disabled this software when I went to play DBD or any other games as I was only using it for Divinity Original Sin 2. I left this software up, went to play DBD and this is what got me banned. DBD team, please be more helpful with ban appeals and don't just see a software and throw everything out the window. I've spent so much time and money on this game, I loved it. I would also like it to be known I didn't get a ban on any other games which used EAC it was only DBD.

我玩了500+小时了，也勉强算是老玩家了，对这个游戏也是有很深的情感的，但是现在这个样子已经把我的游戏热情磨没了。老套的新角色，无数的BUG这些也就忍了，毕竟习惯了。但是网络的恶化真的受不了了。几乎玩10把5把会中途掉线，以前可能玩一天出现几次吧。现在基本是常态了。这个已经把我的游戏热情磨没了。也不求什么服务器，或者网络优化了，改回原来的就好。真的。

I really love this game, but the community is very toxic as many people will tell you. Fortunately now with the dedicated servers coming up you shouldn't have to worry about running into lagswitchers anymore, and maybe the community would become better. The game has had some real issues but they have been getting better and they are being worked on all the time. The biggest issue really is the community, and that's not something the devs can actually do anything about, that's something WE as the community are responsible for. 

We have to encourage each other to be better and stop being so fucking whiny. Killer mains, play some survivor, see that side and see just how it is to be tunneled and camped. Survivor mains, play some killer, see that side and just how it is to have someone intentionally try to piss you off, switch to purple flashlights at the last second etc. Both the killer and survivor mains are biased and won't see to reason, but those are actually more a loud minority in my experience. Most of the community really isn't like that, most killers I face are fair and realize that the game is supposed to be fun for all of us. Most survivors I face don't teabag and click a flashlight at me every chance they get.

This Game is great to play Specially with friends 
the game is based on survival which side you pick Killer/Survivor 

if you picked up Survivor side Each character has his/her own ability and you`re going to rely on it a lot to survive and there will be 4 survivors verses 1 killer and each killer has different abilities you need to do the objectives in the game and if the killer sees you and started chasing  try to survive as long as you can and draw the killer away from your team to buy them the time to repair the generators and having higher chances of Escaping (surviving)


and 

if you picked up killer side every killer has his/her own power you gotta have acknowledge of the power and the best example is killer the Trapper 
you can place traps anywhere to catches survivors and if you placed the traps right and hidden or on blind spot it`ll give you higher chance to capture the survivors or gets them injured 
and you need to disturb the survivors from doing the gens and making progress with it and starts chasing them and kills them.

and after a while of playing the game you will have the best acknowledge of the game and it`s mechanics and how to beat up the survivors but don`t be mad or upset if the survivors escapes it happens and this is part of the game you can`t always win

And the same thing with survivors after playing the game for a while you will be able to do gens and waste killer time to buy your friends time to repair gens and win but same thing with killer sometimes you might loose

Отличная игра, не рекомендую никому, хорошее руководство, ребята знают что нужно комьюнити, Закроем все двери и окна, сделаем не юзабельные палетки. Лишим людей удовольствия мансов, добавим сидения в кустах и дрочильни генераторов из раза в раз, какое разнообразие, ведь это так весело. Отличная переработка карт, Любая игра идет 4 года к изменению моделек генераторов, и анимации их подчинки, PRETTY GOD JOB SO FAR. Это тот случай, когда лучше разработчики не трогали игру, и она оставалась классной, молодцы. 2730ч. потерянного времени в никуда #мэтьювернижизньибабки!

게임 도중에 많은 오류가 나타납니다. 판자를 내린 후 캐릭터가 일어서서 걷지 않는 상태로 나타나서 다른 곳에 이동할 때나 앉을 때 자꾸 그냥 서서 에스컬레이터를 타듯이 움직이네요. 또한 대기실에 들어갈 때, 들어가지지 않고 대기창만 계속 뜨는 오류도 드문드문 발생하며 방금전에는 살인마에게 공격당해서 빈사상태가 되자마자 갑자기 지지지지직하는 소리와 함께 멈추고서는 움직여지지도 않아서 강제 랜뽑했네요.... 참고로 처음에는 일반 컴퓨터로 해보고 컴퓨터 때문에 일어난 줄 알았는데 게이밍 노트북으로 게임을 플레이해보아도 똑같이 오류가 나타나는 것으로 보아 데바데 자체의 오류가 맞는것 같습니다.

I think it's fair enough to say that I've now officially retired this game. 

It just keeps getting worse people, it always has and I always clung on thinking it'd get better. Trust me -- it doesn't, it never will. 

Outside of the hacking fandango thats rampant, mixed in with the continously increasing conflict of poor balance, broken maps & characters, the distrust between the community and developing team has never been at its worst.

I just had to step away after my third tyraid of infinite-blinding flashlights, no-clip flying hackers that teabag and insta-heal teams as they willfully know that it'll take 2-3 weeks for a case to lead to an account ban -- only for a new account to be up and running in minutes, for a mere $5.00

Save yourself, while you can.
